column1: Ruth Services will be 11:00 A.M. graveside service at Ochiltree cemetery with a memorial service following at the First Baptist Church 1:00 P.M. on Monday June 22
column2: 2015 officiated by Rev. Richard Laverty. Family visitation will be at Boxwell Brothers Funeral Home from 4:00 P.M. to 6:00 P.M. on Sunday June 21
